scripts.clean: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf node_modules cli/node_modules cli/dist cli/package-lock.json demo/node_modules demo/.expo demo/ios demo/android demo/package-lock.json $TMPDIR/react-native-packager-cache-* $TMPDIR/metro-* $TMPDIR/haste-* tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && npm cache clean --force
